page.title: 12LADRAM BAY (II)
page.content:
April/May|May/June|PeakTime CARAVANS | | | ___________|________|________|______ 4/5 BERTH | Â£ 50 | Â£ 83 | Â£ 74 | | | ___________|________|________|_______ 6 BERTH | Â£ 52 | Â£ 88 | Â£ 79 ___________|________|________|_______ 6 BERTH | Â£ 57 | Â£ 98 | Â£ 84 &SHOWER | | | _____________________________________ Typical costs of caravans _ summer '85
A recent addition to the facilities at the camp is the{swimming pool.}The owner allows the children from {Otterton School}use it in the Summer Term free of charge. The influx of visitors to the camp brings business to the village in general in the summer months.
